Text:
Hi ! Comment for report about this movie file .

REPORT :

Everything ok since the beggining to the end , great quality in picture and sound and on this case the black borders removing make all the sense because in full screen at the top and bottom of the screen the user get 15 to 20 cm black borders giving not too much space beside beeing watchable to the picture itself and of course cause a little unconfortable to the viewer , the Dub plugins corrected this aspect and improved the colours and vivacity of the picture ... 

enjoy ...
